titles.title: A resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide for the germaneness of committee amendments post-cloture.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S643-645)
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Amends rule XXII of the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide that if a measure has been reported by a committee that contains recommended committee amendments, such amendments shall be considered germane post-cloture.
